original: 「黃龍見武陽赤水，九日乃去。」鑄黃龍鼎、建黃龍廟，落成時大量露水，視為王氣，遂後有劉備稱帝年號章武。
text: "Huanglong sees Wuyang Chishui, and I will go on the 9th." The Huanglong Ding was cast and the Huanglong Temple was built. When it was completed, there was a lot of dew, which was regarded as Wang Qi. Then Liu Bei was named Emperor Zhang Wu.
